info.title: DatabricksClient
info.description: These APIs allow end users to operate on Azure Databricks Workspace resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

202.description: Accepted - Returns this status until the asynchronous operation has completed.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update a workspace.

200.description: Created - Returns information about the workspace, including provisioning status.

201.description: Created - Returns information about the workspace, including provisioning status.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all the workspaces within a resource group.

200.description: OK - Returns an array of workspaces.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all the workspaces within a subscription.

200.description: OK - Returns an array of workspaces.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the available RP operations.

default.description: Resource Provider error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List private link resources for a given workspace

200.description: OK - Returns an array of private link resources

get.summary: Get the specified private link resource
get.description: Get the specified private link resource for the given group id (sub-resource)

200.description: OK - Returns the specified of private link resource

get.description: List private endpoint connections of the workspace

200.description: OK - Returns list of private endpoint connections for a workspace

get.description: Get a private endpoint connection properties for a workspace

200.description: OK - Returns the private endpoint connection properties of a workspace

put.description: Update the status of a private endpoint connection with the specified name

parameters.name: privateEndpointConnection
parameters.description: The private endpoint connection with updated properties

200.description: OK -- Update the private endpoint connection properties successfully.

202.description: Accepted - This is a long running operation. The operation returns a 202 if the validation is complete. The response includes an Azure-AsyncOperation header that contains a status URL. Clients are expected to poll the status URL for the status of the operation.

delete.description: Remove private endpoint connection with the specified name

202.description: Accepted - This is a long running operation. The operation returns a 202 if the validation is complete. The response includes an Azure-AsyncOperation header that contains a status URL. Clients are expected to poll the status URL for the status of the operation.

200.description: OK - Returns the status of polling request for the delete operation.

204.description: No Content - PrivateEndpoint does not exist.

get.summary: Gets a list of egress endpoints (network endpoints of all outbound dependencies) in the specified Workspace.
get.description: Gets the list of endpoints that VNET Injected Workspace calls Azure Databricks Control Plane. You must configure outbound access with these endpoints. For more information, see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/databricks/administration-guide/cloud-configurations/azure/udr

200.description: The response contains list of outbound network dependency endpoints

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

systemData.description: The system metadata relating to this resource

uiDefinitionUri.description: The blob URI where the UI definition file is located.

createdBy.description: Indicates the Object ID, PUID and Application ID of entity that created the workspace.

updatedBy.description: Indicates the Object ID, PUID and Application ID of entity that last updated the workspace.

createdDateTime.description: Specifies the date and time when the workspace is created.

workspaceId.description: The unique identifier of the databricks workspace in databricks control plane.

workspaceUrl.description: The workspace URL which is of the format 'adb-{workspaceId}.{random}.azuredatabricks.net'

storageAccountIdentity.description: The details of Managed Identity of Storage Account

entities.description: Encryption entities definition for the workspace.

privateEndpointConnections.description: Private endpoint connections created on the workspace

publicNetworkAccess.description: The network access type for accessing workspace. Set value to disabled to access workspace only via private link.

requiredNsgRules.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether data plane (clusters) to control plane communication happen over private endpoint. Supported values are 'AllRules' and 'NoAzureDatabricksRules'. 'NoAzureServiceRules' value is for internal use only.

TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

Resource.description: The core properties of ARM resources

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. Ex- Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines or Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts.

ManagedIdentityConfiguration.description: The Managed Identity details for storage account.

principalId.description: The objectId of the Managed Identity that is linked to the Managed Storage account.

tenantId.description: The tenant Id where the Managed Identity is created.

type.description: The type of Identity created. It can be either SystemAssigned or UserAssigned.
The type of variable that this is

value.description: The value which should be used for this field.

WorkspaceCustomBooleanParameter.description: The value which should be used for this field.

type.description: The type of variable that this is

value.description: The value which should be used for this field.

WorkspaceCustomObjectParameter.description: The value which should be used for this field.

type.description: The type of variable that this is

value.description: The value which should be used for this field.

amlWorkspaceId.description: The ID of a Azure Machine Learning workspace to link with Databricks workspace

customVirtualNetworkId.description: The ID of a Virtual Network where this Databricks Cluster should be created

customPublicSubnetName.description: The name of a Public Subnet within the Virtual Network

customPrivateSubnetName.description: The name of the Private Subnet within the Virtual Network

enableNoPublicIp.description: Should the Public IP be Disabled?

loadBalancerBackendPoolName.description: Name of the outbound Load Balancer Backend Pool for Secure Cluster Connectivity (No Public IP).

loadBalancerId.description: Resource URI of Outbound Load balancer for Secure Cluster Connectivity (No Public IP) workspace.

natGatewayName.description: Name of the NAT gateway for Secure Cluster Connectivity (No Public IP) workspace subnets.

publicIpName.description: Name of the Public IP for No Public IP workspace with managed vNet.

prepareEncryption.description: Prepare the workspace for encryption. Enables the Managed Identity for managed storage account.

encryption.description: Contains the encryption details for Customer-Managed Key (CMK) enabled workspace.

requireInfrastructureEncryption.description: A boolean indicating whether or not the DBFS root file system will be enabled with secondary layer of encryption with platform managed keys for data at rest.

storageAccountSkuName.description: Storage account SKU name, ex: Standard_GRS, Standard_LRS. Refer https://aka.ms/storageskus for valid inputs.

vnetAddressPrefix.description: Address prefix for Managed virtual network. Default value for this input is 10.139.

resourceTags.description: Tags applied to resources under Managed resource group. These can be updated by updating tags at workspace level.

WorkspaceCustomParameters.description: Custom Parameters used for Cluster Creation.

CreatedDateTime.description: The date and time stamp when the workspace was created.

oid.description: The Object ID that created the workspace.

puid.description: The Personal Object ID corresponding to the object ID above

applicationId.description: The application ID of the application that initiated the creation of the workspace. For example, Azure Portal.

CreatedBy.description: Provides details of the entity that created/updated the workspace.

type.description: The type of variable that this is

value.description: The value which should be used for this field.

WorkspaceEncryptionParameter.description: The object that contains details of encryption used on the workspace.

keySource.description: The encryption keySource (provider). Possible values (case-insensitive):  Default, Microsoft.Keyvault

Encryption.description: The object that contains details of encryption used on the workspace.

managedServices.description: Encryption properties for the databricks managed services.

EncryptionEntitiesDefinition.description: Encryption entities for databricks workspace resource.

keySource.description: The encryption keySource (provider). Possible values (case-insensitive):  Microsoft.Keyvault

keyVaultProperties.description: Key Vault input properties for encryption.

EncryptionV2.description: The object that contains details of encryption used on the workspace.

principalId.description: The provider's principal identifier. This is the identity that the provider will use to call ARM to manage the workspace resources.

roleDefinitionId.description: The provider's role definition identifier. This role will define all the permissions that the provider must have on the workspace's container resource group. This role definition cannot have permission to delete the resource group.

target.description: Indicates which property in the request is responsible for the error.

ErrorInfo.title: The code and message for an error.

innererror.description: Inner error details if they exist.

ErrorResponse.title: Error response.
ErrorResponse.description: Contains details when the response code indicates an error.

nextLink.description: The URL to use for getting the next set of results.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list Resource Provider operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of Resource Provider operations supported by the Resource Provider resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

PrivateLinkResourcesList.description: The available private link resources for a workspace

value.description: The list of available private link resources for a workspace

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of private link resources.

GroupIdInformation.description: The group information for creating a private endpoint on a workspace

GroupIdInformationProperties.description: The properties for a group information object

requiredMembers.description: The required members for a specific group id

requiredZoneNames.description: The required DNS zones for a specific group id

value.description: The list of returned private endpoint connection.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of endpoint connections.

PrivateEndpointConnection.description: The private endpoint connection of a workspace

PrivateEndpointConnectionProperties.description: The properties of a private endpoint connection

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.title: Private link service service connection state

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the private endpoint connection.

PrivateEndpoint.description: The private endpoint property of a private endpoint connection

PrivateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: The current state of a private endpoint connection

status.description: The status of a private endpoint connection

description.description: The description for the current state of a private endpoint connection

actionRequired.description: Actions required for a private endpoint connection

EndpointDependency.description: A domain name or IP address the Workspace is reaching at.

domainName.description: The domain name of the dependency.

endpointDetails.description: The Ports used when connecting to domainName.

EndpointDetail.description: Connect information from the Workspace to a single endpoint.

ipAddress.description: An IP Address that Domain Name currently resolves to.

port.description: The port an endpoint is connected to.

latency.description: The time in milliseconds it takes for the connection to be created from the Workspace to this IpAddress at this Port.

isAccessible.description: Whether it is possible to create a connection from the Workspace to this IpAddress at this Port.

OutboundEnvironmentEndpoint.description: Egress endpoints which Workspace connects to for common purposes.

category.description: The category of endpoints accessed by the Workspace, e.g. azure-storage, azure-mysql, etc.

endpoints.description: The endpoints that Workspace connect to

OutboundEnvironmentEndpointCollection.description: Collection of outbound network dependency endpoints

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The ID of the target subscription.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for this operation.

ResourceGroupName.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

PeeringNameParameter.name: peeringName
PeeringNameParameter.description: The name of the workspace vNet peering.

GroupId.name: groupId
GroupId.description: The name of the private link resource

PrivateEndpointConnectionName.name: privateEndpointConnectionName
PrivateEndpointConnectionName.description: The name of the private endpoint connection
